title: Linux & Open Source Genius Guide Vol 5 - 2014  UK
description:
Linux & Open Source Genius Guide Vol 5 - 2014  UK

196 Pages | True PDF | English | 18 MB 


The complete guide to using and developing for Linux, written by experts in the open source field. Despite heavy competition from other operating systems, Linux has proved popular among coders, developers and users, and is further thriving due to the recent worldwide success of the Raspberry Pi. Linux & Open Source Genius Guide offers over 350 tutorials which will ensure that you become a Linux expert in no time at all. The useful tutorials and guides cover everything from creating your own Windows 8.1 VM and dual-booting Linux on any device to taking pictures and video with the Raspberry Pi Camera. The book is guaranteed to keep any ardent Linux user busy for weeks.
